mdRecord.dcterms:title: Wealth of the North, general view
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
Woolrych, Francis Humphrey William (Woolrych, Francis Humphrey William (American painter, b. 1868)) [work]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This lunette is one of eight along the west end mezzanine that illustrate Missouri's development and resources. The view here is of a typical northwest Missouri farm with crops of corn and grain, cattle grazing in the pastures, and chickens and hogs in the farmyard. Overhead the sky is a bright blue with big puffy white clouds. -- http://collections.si.edu [work]
